title: "Problem8: Sum Odd Numbers"
author: "Akira MATSUI"
date: "March 29, 2017"
output: pdf_document
---

In this exercise, we will compute sum of odd numbers in an array. On `R`, you can check wheter a number is odd or prime by `%`.

```{r}
 a = 4
 b = 7

 a%%2
 b%%2
```

if `x%%2` returns `1`, x is an odd number.
